text: allahu nasippikkukayea kathinamayi siksikkukayea ceyyan peakunna oru janavibhagatte ninnalentinan upadesikkunnatâ€Œ? enn avaril petta oru samuham paranna sandarbham (srad'dhikkuka) avar marupati parannu: ninnalute raksitavinkal (nannal) aparadhattil ninn olivakunnatin ventiyanâ€Œ. oru vela avar suksmata paliccennum varamallea
